gov.ornl.keva.sstable

Class BlockSSTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ornl.keva.sstable.SSTable
      • gov.ornl.keva.sstable.BlockSSTable

  • public class BlockSSTable
extends SSTable
    SSTable implementation that writes data as a set of blocks. Reading a value requires reading a block and then indexing into that block. Each block is separately compressed. NOTE: This Implementation Is Not Finished!
    Author:
    James Horey

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Delete the sstable. This involves the following steps: (1) Deleting the actual data file. (2) Deleting the key index file. (3) Deleting the bloom filter file.
        Specified by:
        delete in class SSTable
